name: tshooter (mortenson)
description:
This is “tshooter” - a local or online multiplayer shooting game you play in your terminal!

Players move in a map and fire lasers at other players. When a player is hit, they respawn on the map and the shooting player’s score is increased. When a player reaches 10 kills, the round ends and a new round begins. 

You can play the game offline with bots, or online with up to eight players!
